mapper.select: SELECT b_ca_name, b_ca_num FROM big_category WHERE b_ca_avaliable = 1
SELECT s_ca_name, s_ca_num FROM small_category WHERE b_ca_num = #{b_ca_num} and s_ca_avaliable = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO small_category (s_ca_name, b_ca_num, s_ca_avaliable) VALUES (#{s_ca_name}, #{b_ca_num}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT d_title, d_num FROM doc WHERE s_ca_num = #{s_ca_num} AND d_available = 1
SELECT d_num, d_title, d_content, p_read, p_update, p_delete FROM doc where d_num = #{d_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc (s_ca_num, p_read, p_insert, p_update, p_delete, d_title, d_content, d_summary, d_available) VALUES (#{s_ca_num}, 1, 2, 2, 2, #{d_title}, #{d_content}, #{d_summary}, 1);
INSERT INTO doc_history (d_version, d_num, d_date, u_id, d_summary, d_content) VALUES (#{d_version}, #{d_num}, SYSDATE(), #{u_id}, #{d_summary}, #{d_content})
mapper.update: UPDATE doc SET p_read = 1 p_update = 2 p_delete = 2 WHERE d_num = #{d_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM doc WHERE d_title = #{d_title} order by d_num desc
SELECT d.d_num, d.d_content, dh.d_version, dh.d_date, dh.d_summary, dh.u_id FROM doc d JOIN doc_history dh ON d.d_num = dh.d_num WHERE d.d_num = #{d_num} AND d_available = 1 ORDER BY d_date DESC

SELECT d.d_num, d.d_title, d.p_read, d.p_insert, d.p_update, d.p_delete, dh.d_content, dh.d_version, dh.d_date, dh.d_summary, dh.u_id FROM doc d JOIN doc_history dh ON d.d_num = dh.d_num WHERE d.d_num = #{d_num} AND d_available = 1 AND dh.d_version = #{d_version} order by dh.d_version DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO star (star, u_id, d_num) VALUES (star, #{u_id}, #{d_num})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM star WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND d_num = #{d_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM doc WHERE d_num IN (SELECT d_num FROM star WHERE u_id=#{u_id})

SELECT d.d_num, d.d_title, d.p_read, d.p_insert, d.p_update, d.p_delete, s.star, s.d_num FROM doc d JOIN ( SELECT d_num, MAX(star) AS star FROM star GROUP BY d_num ) s ON d.d_num = s.d_num ORDER BY s.star DESC;
